summary: Project involves a TV/media schedule application with shows and program slots. Working on adding bios to each show.

existing_features.title: Update the ManagePrograms admin page to include a bio/description input field in the add/edit program dialog form, allowing admins to enter and save a bio for each show.
Display each show's bio on the public SchedulePage, shown beneath or alongside the show name/time for programs that have a bio entered.
Display each show's bio in the UpcomingShows component when a show has a bio, shown beneath the show name.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a bio/description to each show in the schedule
Add a `bio` (or `description`) text field to the Program data type in the backend so each show can store a bio/description string.
